DataWriter  JsonWriter

Class Ext.data.JsonWriter

Package:Ext.data
Defined In:JsonWriter.js
Class:JsonWriter
Extends:DataWriter
Data reader class to create an Array of Ext.data.Record objects from a JSON response

 dataProperty : String
The property-name in request-params where data will be written (defaults to 'data').
DataWriter
 returnJson : Boolean
true to encode the hashed data. Defaults to false, returning the hashed data without encoding.
JsonWriter
 writeAllFields : Boolean
true by default to have DataWriter return ALL fields of a modified record -- not just those that changed. false to ha...
true by default to have DataWriter return ALL fields of a modified record -- not just those that changed. false to have DataWriter only request modified fields from a record.
